text.name: I'll burn away every last drop of your filthy blood
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Combustion], Coin Power +1
When in [FirePunchFuelOverheated] state, deal +10% damage with Coins that consumed [FirePunchFuel]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Consume 10 [FirePunchFuel] and inflict 1 [Combustion] against 2 enemies with the least [Combustion] Potency
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume 10 [FirePunchFuel] and inflict +1 [Combustion] Count against 1 enemy with the least [Combustion] Count

text.name: Firefist
text.desc:
If target has 3+ [Combustion] Count, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 6 [Combustion] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 25 [FirePunchFuel] and deal +1% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed (max 25%)
- When in [FirePunchFuelOverheated] state, deal +3% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed instead (max 75%)
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, or if this Skill consumed [FirePunchFuel], gain 1 [HitDamageUp] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit consumed [FirePunchFuel], inflict 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit consumed [FirePunchFuel], inflict 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Deal +1% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed by this Skill (max 25%)
- When in [FirePunchFuelOverheated] state, deal +3% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed instead (max 75%)

text.name: Firefist
text.desc:
<style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Combustion] Count on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 6 [Combustion] on target (max <style="highlight">3)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 25 [FirePunchFuel] and deal +<style="highlight">2% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed (max <style="highlight">50%)
- When in [FirePunchFuelOverheated] state, deal +<style="highlight">4% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed (max <style="highlight">100%)
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, or if this Skill consumed [FirePunchFuel], gain <style="highlight">2 [HitDamageUp] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit consumed [FirePunchFuel], inflict <style="highlight">2 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit consumed [FirePunchFuel], inflict <style="highlight">2 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count

- When in [FirePunchFuelOverheated] state, deal +<style="highlight">4% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] consumed instead (max <style="highlight">100%)

text.name: I have to keep going for big sis
I have to keep going for big sis

1121121.name: I hope they're from our Office...
1121121.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed: On Hit, deal +5% more Wrath Damage for every 6 [Combustion] on the target (max 20%)

1121101.name: I'm the only survivor...
1121101.desc:
Deal +0.2% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] and [FirePunchFuelOverheated] this unit consumed in this Encounter (max 40%)
- If the main target is a <Bloodfiend>, <Bloodbag>, or if their sum of [Combustion] and [Combustion] Count is 30+, deal +0.3% damage instead (max 60%)

At 1+ [FirePunchFuel] or [FirePunchFuelOverheated], if this unit Staggers or defeats enemies with [Combustion], inflict +2 [Combustion] Count against 2 random enemies without [Combustion] or with the least [Combustion] Count (once per turn)
- For Focused Encounters, on Parts

1121102.name: District 12 Special Workshop Fuel
1121102.desc:
Begin Encounters with 100 [FirePunchFuel]
- At over 50 Stack, become [FirePunchFuel]
- At 50 or less Stack, any [FirePunchFuel] becomes [FirePunchFuelOverheated]
